Conflict resolution: Mind-reading would make it easier to understand the underlying reasons for conflicts, leading to more effective and lasting resolutions.
Deception detection: People could more easily identify when others are lying or hiding information, leading to a more transparent and honest society.
Improved mental health: Individuals could better understand their own thoughts and emotions, leading to increased self-awareness and better mental health outcomes.
Increased empathy: Reading minds would allow people to understand the full range of emotions and experiences of others, fostering greater empathy and compassion.
